title: Interdisciplinary Collaboration and Entrepreneurship Competency Enhancement Workshop: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Process where professionals from diverse fields form teams to solve real-world startup scenarios. Provides an immersive learning environment through VR simulations utilizing smartphone apps.

learning_goals: They can collaborate with practitioners from various fields to refine entrepreneurial ideas.
They can develop prototypes that solve real business problems through problem-based learning (PBL).
They can present and receive feedback on team-based entrepreneurial plans in VR-based simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
